name: Secret Art
desc: Citlali's specialty. The fresh, tender greens are surprisingly crisp, while the grilled shrimp is firm with a hint of sweetness. The perfectly crafted shape can be easily picked up with just one hand... If only a captivating novel were at hand, paired with such a delicacy, you could easily lose yourself in it for a whole day and night. Is this the unique secret art of Granny Itztli's vast knowledge?

customize.name: Recipe: Tatacos
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Tatacos.

customize.name: Tatacos
customize.desc: Thin tacos with filling. Making Tatacos is a three-part process — you bake the tacos first, you add vegetables and grilled shrimp second, then finally, you drizzle sauce over the top. In Natlan, it's hard to say which is a more common sight — phlogiston or Tatacos.

customize.name: Citlali
customize.desc: The great shaman from the Masters of the Night-Wind, the universally-revered Granny Itztli.

customize.name: Secret Art
customize.desc: Citlali's specialty. The fresh, tender greens are surprisingly crisp, while the grilled shrimp is firm with a hint of sweetness. The perfectly crafted shape can be easily picked up with just one hand... If only a captivating novel were at hand, paired with such a delicacy, you could easily lose yourself in it for a whole day and night. Is this the unique secret art of Granny Itztli's vast knowledge?

customize.name: Grainfruit
customize.desc: This plant is named after the giant grains that grow along the cob.

customize.name: Shrimp Meat
customize.desc: A whole piece of deep sea shrimp meat, full of nutrients and bursting with delicious flavor.

customize.name: Cheese
customize.desc: Made from fermented milk. High in energy, it's used in a wide range of dishes.

customize.name: Onion
customize.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

value.text: Revives a character and restores 20% of Max HP, then restores an additional 1,500 HP.
